verses.verse: Afterward he brought me <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; <S%H4325>and<s%>, behold, waters issued <S%H3318>out<s%> from under the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>: for the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> stood toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from under from the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, at the <S%H5045>south<s%> side of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

Then brought he me <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and led me <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> outside unto the <S%H2351>outer<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>; <S%H6379>and<s%>, behold, there ran out <S%H4325>waters<s%> on the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%>.

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> that had the <S%H6957>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6921>eastward<s%>, he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and he brought me <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>; the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were to the <S%H657>ankles<s%>.

Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and brought me <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>; the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were to the <S%H1290>knees<s%>. Again he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and brought me <S%H5674>through<s%>; the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were to the <S%H4975>waist<s%>.

Afterward he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>; and it was a <S%H5158>river<s%> that I <S%H3201>could<s%> not pass <S%H5674>over<s%>: for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1342>risen<s%>, <S%H4325>waters<s%> to swim <S%H7813>in<s%>, a <S%H5158>river<s%> that could not be passed <S%H5674>over<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3212>this<s%>? Then he brought <S%H7725>me<s%>, and caused me to return to the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>.
Now when I had <S%H7725>returned<s%>, <S%H8193>behold<s%>, at the bank of the <S%H5158>river<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> trees on the one side and on the <S%H6086>other<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H4325>me<s%>, These waters issue <S%H3318>out<s%> toward the <S%H6930>east<s%> <S%H1552>country<s%>, and go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H6160>desert<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: which being brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall be <S%H7495>healed<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H5315>pass<s%>, that every thing that <S%H2416>lives<s%>, which <S%H8317>moves<s%>, wherever the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, shall <S%H2421>live<s%>: and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> multitude of <S%H1710>fish<s%>, because these <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7495>there<s%>: for they shall be healed; and every thing shall <S%H2425>live<s%> where the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H1728>pass<s%>, that the fishers shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon it from <S%H5872>En<s%>–gedi even unto <S%H5882>En<s%>–eglaim; they shall be a place to spread <S%H4894>forth<s%> <S%H2764>nets<s%>; their <S%H1710>fish<s%> shall be according to their <S%H4327>kinds<s%>, as the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>.
But the miry <S%H1207>places<s%> there and the <S%H1360>marshes<s%> there shall not be <S%H7495>healed<s%>; they shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H4417>salt<s%>.

And by the <S%H5158>river<s%> upon the <S%H8193>bank<s%> <S%H5927>there<s%>, on this side and on that side, shall grow all <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>, whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall not <S%H5034>fade<s%>, neither shall the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> there be <S%H8552>consumed<s%>: it shall bring forth new <S%H1069>fruit<s%> according to his <S%H2320>months<s%>, because their <S%H4325>waters<s%> they issued <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> there shall be for <S%H3978>food<s%>, and the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> there for <S%H8644>medicine<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H1454>This<s%> shall be the <S%H1366>border<s%>, by which you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall have two <S%H2256>portions<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H376>it<s%>, one as well as <S%H251>another<s%>: concerning the which I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and this <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> unto you for <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

And this shall be the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>, from the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon<s%>, as men <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H6657>Zedad<s%>;

<S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, <S%H1268>Berothah<s%>, <S%H5453>Sibraim<s%>, which is between the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>; <S%H2694>Hazar<s%>–hatticon, which is by the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H2362>Hauran<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2703>Hazar<s%>–enan, the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>. And this is the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>.

And the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> you shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H996>from<s%> <S%H2362>Hauran<s%>, and <S%H996>from<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and <S%H996>from<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H996>from<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, from the <S%H1366>border<s%> unto the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>. And this is the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>.

And the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>, from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> even to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>strife<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>, the <S%H5158>river<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>. And this is the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>.

The <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> also shall be the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> from the <S%H1366>border<s%>, until a man <S%H935>come<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>. This is the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%>.
So shall you <S%H2505>divide<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> unto you according to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H5307>pass<s%>, that you shall divide it by lot for a <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto <S%H1616>you<s%>, and to the strangers that <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3205>you<s%>, which shall beget <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H249>you<s%>: and they shall be unto you as born in the <S%H249>country<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; they shall <S%H5307>have<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7626>pass<s%>, that in what tribe the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>stays<s%>, there shall you <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
